attributes.action: find a new hosting company to run and host this website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After several attempts to search this site for particlar petitions, I gave up as the sites performance and reliability made the attempt pointless.

If you are going to offer such a site, ensure it is reliable enough to use.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
